m_szDocSumamry: Audi "on the brink" of showing a fuel cell vehicle Search email German car maker poised to go into production with a new dynamic & efficient hydrogen-powered car Audi bosses have confirmed they’re “on the brink” of showing a new hydrogen car that is more dynamic, more efficient and that offers an even greater range than anything currently in production. The undisclosed FCV was mooted at Audi’s Future Performance Event in Madrid on Monday, though engineers are keeping tight-lipped on what bodystyle the production car might adopt.
